titles.title: A resolution informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
A resolution informing the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 7, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Informs the House of Representatives that a quorum of the Senate is assembled.
